Merger trees and classes¶

kea.mergerHistory.buildHistory(cosmological_model)¶

Build the merger tree histories of galaxies existing today. Returns a list of galaxy nodes

kea.mergerHistory.findNode(nodeID, node)¶

find a node with a specific galaxyID. Returns that node

kea.mergerHistory.getSFR(galaxy)¶

Given a galactic node of a merger tree, the Steller Formation Rate will be returned

kea.mergerHistory.getType(node)¶

Calculate the type of the given node based on the bulge-to-total mass ratio.

M < 0.4: elliptical galaxy : 0 0.4 < M < 1.56: other galaxies : 1 M > 1.56: irregular & spiral : 2

class kea.mergerHistory.node¶

The node class will can hold data and will be in a tree structure.

addData(data)¶

data should be a dictionary with the data you wish to add to the node

kea.mergerHistory.pprint_tree(node, file=None, _prefix='', _last=True)¶

print the tree beginning at the given node
